overview: A ceramics performance by artist Yanna Marie on the recent bans on Critical Race Theory.  "When you erase the history/experience of one kid to 'protect' another, what you're saying is that there is one type of kid worth protecting."
tagline: When you erase the history/experience of one kid to 'protect' another, what you're saying is that there is one type of kid worth protecting.
title: A.P.
